QuizerPlay: Browser Extension for Learning and Retention

QuizerPlay is an AI-powered platform designed to improve memory retention and boost the efficiency of language learning. Available as a browser extension, it integrates seamlessly into your browsing experience, offering a gamified and interactive way to learn languages. The extension allows you to create flashcards for future study directly from highlighted text, helping you build your personalized learning collection.

With QuizerPlay, you can easily generate new terms for your study deck whenever you come across unfamiliar words or phrases online. The extension prompts you to add them as flashcards, which can be reviewed later to strengthen your language skills. It also periodically reminds you of the flashcards waiting for study, ensuring that your learning remains consistent and organized.

Whether you are browsing the web, reading articles, or interacting with content, QuizerPlay empowers you to learn on-the-go by converting your online experience into valuable language lessons. The browser extension complements the full platform, allowing you to structure your knowledge, earn rewards, and stay motivated as you progress towards language mastery.
